title: Covering Recovery
description: This tipsheet discusses the challenges of preparing for major disasters and the importance of investigative reporting in exploring underlying factors. It highlights key questions that journalists should ask when covering disaster recovery, including issues related to funding, vulnerable populations, and infrastructure.
